comment: GAB Management has been totally irresponsible in providing a forum for unabashed Nazis and antiSemites. There are limits to free speech, and a mute button is NOT the answer. Theres nothing socially healthy about the free public exchange of blatant hate speech.
amr:
# ::snt GAB Management has been totally irresponsible in providing a forum for unabashed Nazis and antiSemites. There are limits to free speech, and a mute button is NOT the answer. Theres nothing socially healthy about the free public exchange of blatant hate speech.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / responsible-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (p / provide-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "GAB"
                              :op2 "Management"))
                  :ARG1 (f / forum
                        :beneficiary (a / and
                              :op1 (p2 / person
                                    :mod (p3 / political-movement
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Nazism")))
                              :op2 (p4 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (o2 / oppose-01
                                          :ARG1 (e / ethnic-group
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Jew"))))
                              :ARG1-of (u / unabashed-02)))
                  :degree (t / total))
            :snt2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (l / limit-01
                        :ARG1 (s / speak-01
                              :ARG3-of (f2 / free-04)))
                  :op2 (a3 / answer-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG2 (b / button
                              :ARG0-of (m2 / mute-01))))
            :snt3 (h / healthy
                  :mod (s2 / social)
                  :domain (e2 / exchange-01
                        :ARG1 (s3 / speak-01
                              :ARG3-of (p5 / public-02)
                              :mod (b2 / blatant)
                              :ARG3-of (h2 / hate-01))
                        :ARG1-of (f3 / free-04)))))

# ::snt WWII ended years ago.
(e / end-01
      :ARG1 (w / war
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "WWII"))
      :time (b / before
            :op1 (n2 / now)
            :quant (m / multiple
                  :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (y / year)))))

comment: That is a horrible use of speech and very vulgar language
amr:
# ::snt That is a horrible use of speech and very vulgar language
(u / use-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / speak-01)
            :op2 (l / language
                  :mod (v / vulgar
                        :degree (v2 / very))))
      :mod (h / horrible)
      :domain (t / that))

comment: You don't have to use racial slurs to get your point across.
amr:
# ::snt You don't have to use racial slurs to get your point across.
(o / obligate-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (y / you)
      :ARG2 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (s / slur
                  :mod (r / race))
            :ARG2 (g / get-04
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (a / across
                        :domain (p / point-04
                              :ARG0 y)))))

# ::snt Just mute him
(m / mute-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (h / he)
      :mod (j / just))
